masterFinding.remediationInstructions: Ensure that JWT messages are signed by a trusted party and validate the signature to ensure JWTs have not been modified.
masterFinding.name: JWT - Weak Signature Validation
masterFinding.businessImpact: Weak JWT signature verification may allow malicious users to tamper with JWT token content. This may result in unauthorized access or elevated privileges in the application that uses JWT for authentication.
masterFinding.description: The application does not perform adequate validation of the JWT signatures to prevent JWT token tampering.
